cards.title: Lore
powers: Reveal cards from the top of {Lore}'s deck until a Story card is revealed. Put that card into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into {Lore}'s deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player discards a card. Each other player may draw a card.
One player discards a card. Move two cards with a matching keyword from a trash into their owner's hand.
One player discards a card. Reveal cards from the top of their deck until a card with a matching keyword is revealed. Put that card into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the deck.

cards.title: A Story of Triumph
cards.body: {Lore} deals one target 2 radiant damage. You may draw a card.

cards.title: A Story of Speed
cards.body: {Lore} deals one target 2 sonic damage. You may shuffle one trash into its deck.

cards.title: A Story of Fire
cards.body: {Lore} deals one target 2 fire damage. Lore deals a second target 2 fire damage.

cards.title: A Story of Ice
cards.body: {Lore} deals one target 2 cold damage. One target regains 2 hp.

cards.title: Save Yourself
body: Return all other action cards in play to your hand.

The first time each turn a hero target would deal itself damage, you may redirect that damage to any target. If you do, discard a card or destroy this card. If this card would be destroyed this way, {Lore} first deals himself 2 toxic damage.

cards.title: Hubris
cards.body: {Lore} deals one target 4 energy damage and himself 1 psychic damage.

cards.title: Love Triangle
cards.body: Return all other romance cards in play to your hand.
cards.powers: {Lore} deals himself 2 psychic damage. Two character cards other than {Lore} regain 2 hp.

cards.title: Double Agent
cards.body: {Lore} may deal one non-character villain target 2 psychic damage. A target dealt damage that way now deals a character card in its play area 2 irreducible melee damage.
Return all other epic cards in play to your hand.
cards.powers: Destroy any number of Story cards. Draw X cards, where X is the number of cards destroyed this way plus 1.

cards.title: Revengement
body: Return all other action cards in play to your hand.
Whenever a hero target with fewer than 10 hp is dealt damage, Lore may deal one target 1 cold damage.

cards.title: Whirlwinding
cards.body: Return all other romance cards in play to your hand.
cards.powers: Select one hero character card. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that hero is dealt damage, Lore regains 1 hp and deals one target 2 psychic damage.

cards.title: Page Turner
body: Return all other mystery cards in play to your hand.
At the end of your turn, reveal the top cards of 2 decks. You may replace or discard each card.

cards.title: Callback
cards.body: Return all other mystery cards in play to your hand.
cards.powers: One player other than Lore may take a card from their trash and put on top of their deck. One player may draw a card.

cards.title: SpeedReader
body: Return all other epic cards in play to your hand.

At the end of your turn, you may destroy one Story and play one Story. If a Story is destroyed this way, {Lore} deals one target 1 sonic damage. If a Story is played this way, {Lore} deals himself 1 irreducible sonic damage. You may then play another Story. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Dewey The Decimal
cards.body: Search your deck for a Story and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. You may draw a card.

cards.title: Blessing of the Fifteenth Stone
body: Return all other myth cards in play to your hand.
At the end of your turn, select one target other than {Lore} with 5 or fewer hp. Until the start of your next turn, that target is indestructible.

cards.title: Epilogue
cards.body: Return all other myth cards in play to your hand.
cards.powers: Select a trash. You may search that trash for a target and put that target into play.

cards.title: Rhetorical Boost
body: Increase damage dealt by {Lore} by 1.
Whenever a story card enters play, draw a card.
If this card has negative HP, reduce damage dealt to {Lore} by 1 for each HP below zero.

cards.title: Cliffhanger
body: You may destroy one Environment card.
Play the top card of the environment deck.

cards.title: Red Herring
body: If there is a mystery card in play, select a target. Redirect all damage dealt to that target to the environment target with the lowest hp until the start of your next turn.
If there is not a mystery card in play, draw a card.

cards.title: Rallying Cry
body: If there is an action card in play, increase damage dealt by hero targets by 1 until the start of your next turn.
If there is not an action card in play, draw a card.

cards.title: Honeymoon
body: If there is a romance card in play, select a target. Prevent the first damage dealt to that target each turn until the start of your next turn.
If there is not a romance card in play, draw a card.

cards.title: Even the Score
body: If there is a myth card in play, any hero with an odd number of HP regains 1 hp.
If there is not a myth card in play, draw a card.
